subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The United States will be without the regular starters Landon Donovan, DaMarcus Beasley, Clint Dempsey and Carlos Bocanegra when it plays a full-strength Argentina next week at Copa América in Venezuela. Coach Bob Bradley went almost exclusively with young players in compiling his roster for the 12-nation championship. Of the 22 players, 16 have made 10 or fewer appearances for the United States team. Fourteen are under age 25. Only eight players on the roster for tomorrow’s Concacaf Gold Cup final will make the trip to South America, with the veteran goalkeeper Kasey Keller the most recognizable name.
